channel.title: Ip change Help
channel.description: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,464527.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,464527.0.html[/url] is the server i use and it comes with a client. It is based off of delta and has been majorly modified for the better. I decided to use it on my server instead of my old source but when i go to change the ip in the client i cant find the code for it... I have looked in client.java where it is in other clients but i can't find crap... Any help? :confused:

item.title: Ip change Help
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

Well search around on google and stuff for ’ 317 Run.bat for Windows 7 or Windows Vista or whatever.’

Read full topic

item.title: Ip change Help
item.dc:creator: @Valcorex Valcorex
item.description:
@Valcorex wrote:

holy crap, i can’t believe i missed this! :eek: It was the 2nd line of code in gui.java lol thanks for the help and i have another question… How do you get the client to work for multiple operating systems? Everytime i move it to another computer it wont open correctly even after i check the paths and java versions it just doesnt open on anyother computer correctly…

Read full topic

item.title: Ip change Help
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

Look for a file called ‘Gui.Java’ and search 127.0.0.1 in it.
Or you could look in ‘Client.java’ search for 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
